title: New life for a Spanish farmer
creator_credit: Public Media and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: Follows a Spanish farmer as he moves from arid land once belonging to his ancestors to an agricultural project sponsored by the government where he is given a plot of land and is taught new techniques of farming.
creator_credit_for_label: Public Media and Institut für Film und Bild
